original: Forsgren, Hertha. — Med. kand. 18, med. lic. 23, med. dr 27. Und iläk. v. Hässleby san. 22-23, v. Orupssan. 24, v. länssanat. i Sundsvall 24, v. Hässleby san. 25-26, bitr. där. i histoi. v. Karol. inst. 27-28, doc. där 28-31, assist I läk. v. Maria sjukh. med. avd. 27, aman. v. de proped. kurs. å sjukh. Sit Eriks med. avd. 27-29, und iläk. där 29-31, san iläk. vid Svenshögens san. fr. 31. Pres. i Int. sällsk. f. biol. rytm-forskn. 37, ordf. i mödrahj ind f. Gbgs o. Boh. 1. fr. 37, dispiled. i län. fr. 32. RNO 44. Fors gren, Hertha Thorborg Louise, tandläkare, Svenshögen, f. 18/10/98 i Sthlm av J. E. Lundquist o. Emilia Johansson. G. 21 m. med. dr Erik Forsgren. B-arn i Maud f. 22, Wiveka 24, Ulf 26. — Med. kand. v. Karol. inst. 20, tandläk. 24. Praktik i Mariannelund 24-27, i Sthlm 27-30, i Svenshögen sed. 31.
translated: Forsgren, Hertha - Medical candidate 1918, medical license 1923, medical doctorate 1927. Assistant physician at Hässleby sanatorium in 1922-23, Orups sanatorium in 1924, county hospital in Sundsvall in 1924, Hässleby sanatorium in 1925-26, and assistant in histology at Karolinska Institute in 1927-28. Docent at Karolinska Institute in 1928-31, assistant physician in the medical department at St. Eriks Hospital in 1927, assistant doctor in the preclinical course at St. Eriks medical department in 1927-29, assistant physician there in 1929-31, and sanatorium physician at Svenshögens sanatorium from 1931. President of the International Society for Biological Rhythm Research in 1937, chairman of the maternity aid association for Gothenburg and Bohuslän 1. from 1937, and dispiled. in county from 1932. Holder of the Order of the North Star (RNO) in 1944. Forsgren, Hertha Thorborg Louise, dentist, Svenshögen, born on October 18, 1898 in Stockholm, to J.E. Lundquist and Emilia Johansson. Married to medical doctor Erik Forsgren in 1921, with children Maud (born 1922), Wiveka (born 1924), and Ulf (born 1926). Graduated with a medical degree from Karolinska Institute in 1920 and with a degree in dentistry in 1924. Practiced in Mariannelund from 1924-27, Stockholm from 1927-30, and has practiced in Svenshögen since 1931.

memberOf.name: International Society for Biological Rhythm Research
Maternity Aid Association for Gothenburg and Bohuslän
